Zhumaev\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"12.0pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Segoe UI\\\"\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Hi there! \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"My name is Adilet Zhumaev. I am responsible for Quality Engineering in Kyrgyzstan.  \\nWe all come to EPAM on different paths. Regardless of the background and the path covered, you are a part of our testing team. Glad to see you with us.\\nNow you can grow with us in Test Automation, Performance testing, Data Quality, Security testing, Accessibility testing, Test Management, and Quality Architecture, expand your network among testers around the world, improvise leadership skills, participate in various events, engage in resource development and not only. We will work together on a vast number of exciting tasks and meet at different working events.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Start local, think global, and constantly raise the bar of excellence.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Welcome to our team and let`s go!\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"9.0pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-ascii-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-hansi-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"color\":\"#444444\",\"background\":\"white\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-ascii-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-hansi-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"color\":\"#444444\",\"background\":\"white\"}}}]}]}]}}"
